text: The Adventures of Buratino () is a 1959 Soviet animated movie directed by Ivan Ivanov-Vano and Dmitriy Babichenko.Приключения БуратиноПРИКЛЮЧЕНИЯ БУРАТИНО (1959) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1959 movies Category:1950s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Ivanov-Vano
title: The Adventures of Buratino (1959 movie)
